prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
### 7. Delegate Tasks

Delegate tasks that others can handle effectively. This frees up your time for more critical tasks and ensures that all responsibilities are managed.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Delegate, tasks, responsibilities, time management, efficiency, prioritization
